MergeCells.name: MergeCells
MergeCells.description: Merge array of cells. If merge was done successfully, it will return merged cell, otherwise "null". Warning: The number of cells in any row and the number of rows in the current table may be changed.

SetTableLook.name: SetTableLook
SetTableLook.description:
Specify the components of the conditional formatting of the referenced table style (if one exists) which shall be applied to the set of table rows with the current table-level property exceptions. A table style can specify up to six different optional conditional formats [Example: Different formatting for first column], which then can be applied or omitted from individual table rows in the parent table.

The default setting is to apply the row and column banding formatting, but not the first row, last row, first column, or last column formatting.

params.name: isFirstColumn
params.description: Specifies that the first column conditional formatting shall be applied to the table.

params.name: isFirstRow
params.description: Specifies that the first row conditional formatting shall be applied to the table.

params.name: isLastColumn
params.description: Specifies that the last column conditional formatting shall be applied to the table.

params.name: isLastRow
params.description: Specifies that the last row conditional formatting shall be applied to the table.

params.name: isHorBand
params.description: Specifies that the horizontal banding conditional formatting shall not be applied to the table.

params.name: isVerBand
params.description: Specifies that the vertical banding conditional formatting shall not be applied to the table.

AddRow.name: AddRow
AddRow.description: Add a new row to the current table.

params.name: oCell
params.description: If not specified a new row will be added to the end of the table.

params.name: isBefore
params.description: Add a new row before or after the specified cell. If no cell is specified, then this parameter will be ignored.

AddColumn.name: AddColumn
AddColumn.description: Add a new column to the end of the current table.

params.name: oCell
params.description: If not specified a new column will be added to the end of the table.

params.name: isBefore
params.description: Add a new column before or after the specified cell. If no cell is specified, then this parameter will be ignored.

RemoveRow.name: RemoveRow
RemoveRow.description: Remove the table row with a specified cell.

RemoveColumn.name: RemoveColumn
RemoveColumn.description: Remove the table column with a specified cell.

SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specify the shading which shall be applied to the extents of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type applied to the contents of the current table. Can be ShdType or ApiFill.
